meanings.definition: To sell or promote aggressively or enthusiastically.
meanings.sent1: The salesman supersells the new product to every customer he meets.
meanings.sent2: She always supersells the latest fashion trends to her friends.
meanings.sent3: The enthusiastic girl supersells her homemade cookies to everyone in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The company supersells its services to clients, ensuring they stand out in the market.
meanings.sent5: The energetic team supersells their fundraising idea to the community with passion.

meanings.definition: A person who sells aggressively or enthusiastically.
meanings.sent1: The supersells at the mall always has a big smile and a persuasive pitch.
meanings.sent2: She became known as the supersells of the team for her exceptional sales skills.
meanings.sent3: The supersells at the car dealership could sell ice to an Eskimo!
meanings.sent4: He is a true supersells, always exceeding his sales targets with his enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The young entrepreneur proved to be a natural supersells, attracting customers effortlessly.
